briefTitle: Persistant Organics Pollutants in Breast Cancer.
officialTitle: Role of Persistant Organics Pollutants in the Metastatic Potential of Malignant Breast Tumor.
conditions: Breast Cancer, Persistant Organic Pollutants, Lymph Node Metastases
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Metastatic lymph node status based of persistant organic pollutants level measured by by gas chromatography coupled to high-resolution mass spectrometry.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient with breast tumor: benign or malignant
* Tumor size at least 1cm or palpable tumor
* Undergoing a breast surgery in European Georges Pompidou hospital
* Understanding the protocol and who signed a written consent

Exclusion Criteria: patients unable to give informed consent

* Dementia
* Guardianship
